oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Remembering Dick Ivy
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Gallaway, Benny J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: With sadness, I note the passing of long-time aviculturist Dick lvy. Aviculture has lost one of its giants. I had the opportunity to know Dick over the past several years and had the opportunity to attend his meetings and to introduce him as a speaker at AFA's last convention. I characterized him as a soldier, statesman, and Virginia gentleman. He was indeed all those, and much more. Dick had a rare...
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: AFA Watchbird; Vol. 31 No. 1 (2004): First Quarter 2004; 15
